articles.title: LG Wing and Google Pixel 5 get C-band 5G approval - The Verge
articles.description: The FCC has cleared the LG Wing and Pixel 5 to use mid-band 5G spectrum currently up for auction. The new frequencies will give AT&T and Verizon 5G networks a speed boost.
articles.content:
The devices will be ready for the fast mid-band spectrum when it comes online
The unusual LG Wing is one of only a few devices approved to use C-band 5G so far.
